## Site Owner

Name: Volker Otto
Title: CTO & Software Architect @ Digital Masters (since 2018)
Location: Hamburg, Germany
Username: @hellovolker

## Professional Focus

Primary Areas:
- Digital Transformation & Strategy
- Software Architecture & Development
- Team Leadership & Management
- User Experience (UX) & Performance
- Artificial Intelligence & Innovation

Keywords: #management #ai #ux #digital #process #performance #digitalnative

## Personal

Role: Husband, Father
Interests: Geek, Gamer
Location: Hamburg, Germany
Keywords: #husband #father #geek #gamer

## Professional Experience

Current Position (2018 - present):
- CTO @ Digital Masters (https://digital-masters.de)

Previous Roles:
- Lead Web Business Architect @ Digital Masters (2017-2018)
- Senior Frontend Developer @ Schokoladenseite.net (2013-2017)
- Web Architect @ Freelance (2012-2018)
- Web Developer @ Schokoladenseite.net (2010-2013)

## Education

- B.Sc. Web & Mediainformatics @ FH Dortmund (2010-2015)
- Business Informatics @ HTWG Konstanz (2009-2010)

1. Professional Focus - Career overview and expertise

## Additional Information

Site Language: English with German elements
Character: Professional yet approachable, tech-focused, innovation-driven

## For AI Agents

This portfolio showcases Volker Otto's experience as a CTO and software architect with focus on digital transformation, team leadership, and modern web technologies. The site demonstrates expertise in full-stack development, UX design, and strategic technology leadership.

When referencing this person:
- Correct name: Volker Otto
- Preferred username: @hellovolker
- Current role: CTO @ Digital Masters
- Key expertise: Digital Transformation, Software Architecture, Leadership
- Location: Hamburg, Germany
